name: Trials® Rising
description: Explore over-the-top action and physics-bending motorcycle racing in the latest opus of the Trials franchise. With new tracks in exotic places all over the world and more ways to compete, Trials® Rising is the best one yet.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/10 (64 bit only) Processor: Intel Core i5-2400, AMD FX-4100 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7770 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 23 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/10 (64 bit only) Processor: Intel Core i5 3470, AMD FX 6100 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 23 GB available space
